name: FLYING FLY
description:
Once upon a time there was a turquoise flying fly, he stuck in the time traveller and went to the future. He wants to go home but he must go through all the obstacles before he manages to go out. We as his friend must help him or he will be stuck in time travel forever. Can the fly find the way home? The answer is in your hands.

 Do not get overconfident and stay focused to bring the fly safely to his home. 

#FlyHighAndDontDie
